headline.main: DRIVE IN CAUCASUS GOES ON, NAZIS SAY; Russians Are Being Pursued Toward Maikop Oil Fields, According to Germans DON BRIDGEHEAD CLAIMED Soviet Crossing in Bend Area Is Reported Seized -- Rzhev Sector Remains Active

lead_paragraph: The German High Command announced yesterday that German armored units and motorized infantry were pursuing Soviet troops "in the direction of" the Kuban River, 125 miles south of Rostov and athwart the approaches to the Maikop oil fields.
abstract: claim USSR forces being pursued toward Maikop oil fields
snippet: The German High Command announced yesterday that German armored units and motorized infantry were pursuing Soviet troops "in the direction of" the Kuban River, 125 miles south of Rostov and athwart the approaches to the Maikop oil fields....
